text:
Athens, GA - http://eupathdb.org

Do you want to contribute to the fight against malaria and other parasites? EuPathDB is looking for a front-end web developer to help scientists perform dynamic computational experiments on genomic-scale datasets. You'll need to be familiar with Java, Javascript, CSS, HTML, and web services. Knowledge of SQL, Perl, Tomcat and Apache are also desirable. For more information, write to at jobs AT apidb DOT org.
